Introduction to ICT Concepts.description: Understand the philosophy behind ICT and its unique approach to trading.

Market Structure Basics.description: Learn about market phases, support and resistance, and price action basics.

resources.title: Technical Analysis of the Financial Markets by John Murphy

Candlestick Patterns.description: Study basic candlestick patterns and their meanings.

resources.title: Japanese Candlestick Charting Techniques by Steve Nison

Market Structure.description: Learn to identify higher highs, higher lows, lower highs, and lower lows.

resources.title: ICT YouTube Videos on Market Structure

Understanding Institutional Order Flow.description: Learn how institutions move the market and how to identify their footprints.

resources.title: ICT Videos on Institutional Order Flow

Order Blocks.description: Identify and understand order blocks and their significance.

Liquidity Pools.description: Study liquidity pools and how they affect price movements.

Stop Hunts and Liquidity Runs.description: Learn how and why institutions perform stop hunts.

Advanced Market Structure.description: Dive deeper into market structure shifts and identifying trends.

Time and Price Theory.description: Understand the relationship between time and price in market movements.

resources.title: ICT Lessons on Time and Price Theory

ICT Pattern Recognition.description: Learn specific ICT patterns such as the ICT Killzones, Fair Value Gaps, and Optimal Trade Entry (OTE).

Trade Setup and Execution.description: Understand how to set up and execute trades using ICT methodologies.

Developing an ICT-Based Trading Strategy.description: Combine learned concepts into a coherent trading strategy.

Backtesting Your Strategy.description: Use historical data to backtest your strategy.

Demo Trading.description: Start applying your strategy on a demo account to gain practical experience.

resources.title: Demo accounts on TradingView or MetaTrader

Refining Your Strategy.description: Analyze your trades and refine your strategy based on performance.

Join ICT Communities.description: Participate in ICT-focused trading communities and forums.

Attend Webinars and Advanced Courses.description: Attend ICT webinars and enroll in advanced courses to stay updated.

Maintain a Trading Journal.description: Document every trade, including entry and exit points, rationale, and outcomes.

resources.title: How to Keep a Trading Journal

Continuous Risk Management.description: Always adhere to strict risk management rules.

Adapt and Evolve.description: Be prepared to adapt your strategy as market conditions change.
